pages.text: As it turns out, the burning wrath of the sun is a terrible inconvenience for $(l:bewitchment:creatures/vampire)Vampires$(). Thankfully, there is a solution to this.$(br)$(item)Vampire Sunscreen$(), when applied, will reflect all sun rays from Vampires, causing them to gently sparkle instead.$(br)Nevertheless, this will drastically weaken its vampiric user.
Vampire Sunscreen is crafted using a $(l:bewitchment:tools/witch_cauldron)Witch Cauldron$(). One dose lasts around three minutes.
